author: vmassol
msg: - Added new maven.jboss.hostname plugin property. It defaults to localhost and gives the host name of the server to stop when calling maven jboss:stop.
- JBoss failed to start on unix. This has been fixed.

author: bwalding
msg: Added support for lserver connections - connection to a pserver on a local machine.

author: bwalding
msg: Now throws NoGoalException if no goal could be found to run
